name: Indian Veterinary Research Institute
desc: Indian Veterinary Research Institute, located in Bareilly, Uttar Pradesh, is a premier institution for veterinary education and research. With a focus on innovation and excellence, it prepares students to address the challenges in veterinary science and animal husbandry.

name: Postgraduate Institute of Medical Education and Research
desc: Postgraduate Institute of Medical Education and Research, situated in Chandigarh, Punjab, is a renowned institution for medical education and research. With world-class facilities and expert faculty, it offers comprehensive programs to train healthcare professionals and advance medical research.

name: Tamil Nadu Veterinary and Animal Sciences University
desc: Tamil Nadu Veterinary and Animal Sciences University, located in Chennai, Tamil Nadu, is a leading institution for veterinary education and research. With a commitment to excellence and innovation, it prepares students to meet the evolving needs of the veterinary and animal sciences sector.

name: Guru Angad Dev Veterinary and Animal Sciences University
desc: Guru Angad Dev Veterinary and Animal Sciences University, situated in Ludhiana, Punjab, is a distinguished institution for veterinary education and research. With state-of-the-art infrastructure and renowned faculty, it offers comprehensive programs to train students for careers in veterinary science and animal husbandry.

name: Govind Ballabh Pant University of Agriculture and Technology
desc: Govind Ballabh Pant University of Agriculture and Technology, located in Pantnagar, Uttarakhand, is a premier institution for agricultural education and research. With a focus on innovation and sustainable practices, it equips students with the knowledge and skills to address the challenges in agriculture and allied sectors.

name: Sher-e-Kashmir University of Agricultural Sciences and Technology-Srinagar
desc: Sher-e-Kashmir University of Agricultural Sciences and Technology-Srinagar, situated in Srinagar, Jammu and Kashmir, is a leading institution for agricultural education and research in the region. With a focus on agricultural innovation and technology, it prepares students to address the unique challenges faced by farmers in the Himalayan region.

name: Lala Lajpat Rai University of Veterinary and Animal Sciences
desc: Lala Lajpat Rai University of Veterinary and Animal Sciences, located in Hisar, Haryana, is a renowned institution for veterinary education and research. With a focus on academic excellence and industry collaboration, it prepares students for careers in veterinary science and animal husbandry.

name: Banaras Hindu University
desc: Banaras Hindu University, situated in Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh, is a prestigious institution known for its multidisciplinary education and research programs. With a rich heritage and modern facilities, it offers diverse opportunities for students to excel in their chosen fields.

name: Anand Agricultural University
desc: Anand Agricultural University, located in Anand, Gujarat, is a leading institution for agricultural education and research. With a focus on experiential learning and industry collaboration, it prepares students to address the challenges faced by farmers and contribute to agricultural development.

name: Assam Agricultural University
desc: Assam Agricultural University, situated in Jorhat, Assam, is a premier institution for agricultural education and research in the Northeast region. With a focus on agricultural innovation and sustainable practices, it prepares students to address the unique challenges faced by farmers in the region.

name: Sher-e-Kashmir University of Agricultural Sciences and Technology-Jammu
Orissa University of Agriculture and Technology
